info.author: Pablo Saavedra
info.description:
ssrr
====

Simple Stream Reflector for RTMP servers

Command execution example
=========================

Next example shows how to reflect streams from 10.1.1.12 host to
10.8.80.14 host:

 /usr/local/bin/ssrr  -L /var/log/ssrr/ssrr.log -i  10.1.1.12 -d 10.9.80.14


Logrotate rule example
======================

/var/log/ssrr/*.log {
  daily
  missingok
  rotate 52
  compress
  delaycompress
  # notifempty
  create 640 root adm
  sharedscripts
  postrotate
    for i in `ps ax | grep /usr/local/bin/ssrr |  grep -v grep | awk '{print $1}'`
    do
      kill -HUP $i
    done
  endscript
}

info.html_description:
ssrr
====

Simple Stream Reflector for RTMP servers

Command execution example
=========================

Next example shows how to reflect streams from 10.1.1.12 host to
10.8.80.14 host:

/usr/local/bin/ssrr -L /var/log/ssrr/ssrr.log -i 10.1.1.12 -d 10.9.80.14


Logrotate rule example
======================

/var/log/ssrr/*.log {
daily
missingok
rotate 52
compress
delaycompress
# notifempty
create 640 root adm
sharedscripts
postrotate
for i in `ps ax | grep /usr/local/bin/ssrr | grep -v grep | awk '{print $1}'`
do
kill -HUP $i
done
endscript
}
